data.name: The Darkside Detective - Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
This is the complete soundtrack for The Darkside Detective. Composed by Ben Prunty

Originally inspired by John Carpenter and other 80's films, this soundtrack eventually grew to pull inspirations from Danny Elfman, William Orbit, Nine Inch Nails, funk music, and old video games. The whole album ended up being quite a grab bag of different styles and ideas. This is what makes soundtracks fun!

Despite being part of a comedy game, the music plays its part relatively straight-faced. This helps sell the atmosphere and lets the comedy do its own thing without the player being distracted. I also wanted the music to reflect the rich colors of the game's gorgeous pixel art.

Tracklisting
1. A Town Unlike Any Other 01:45
2. The Darkside Division 01:57
3. Occult for Dummies 02:36
4. Spooky Doorway 01:54
5. Tome Alone 02:36
6. Ghost Whisperer 03:10
7. 66-6 St. 03:08
8. Darkside Portal 03:47
9. Demon on a Floppy Disk 01:57
10. Security Room 00:50
11. Happy Retirement 01:56
12. Goblins-and-Ghouls Division 03:20
13. The Truth is Around Here Somewhere 03:23
14. BETI 01:28
15. Bigfoot 01:56
16. Nigel's Very Real Jamboree 01:56
17. Some Real Police Work 01:05
18. The Gem of Osiris 02:52
19. Entirely Legal Ritual Components 02:23
20. Al Caphoney's Mansion 02:55
21. Sewer Gator 02:06
22. Smithy's Graveyard 02:20
23. The Lord Speaks Through Me, Brosef 02:20
24. Super Biblical 02:33
25. Revenge of the Don 01:09
26. Epilogue 02:26
27. Bonus Track: Busty Belle's Booty Boutique 01:57

The album cover art was made by Paul Conway, the artist for The Darkside Detective.

data.short_description: This is the complete soundtrack for The Darkside Detective. Composed by Ben Prunty 22 tracks from the game. Originally inspired by John Carpenter and other 80's films, this soundtrack eventually grew to pull inspirations from Danny Elfman, William Orbit, Nine Inch Nails, funk music, and old video games.
data.reviews:
“The Darkside Detective soundtrack tells a story (with no spoilers) on its own.”
9/10 – SounsScape Magazine

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP
  • Processor: Pentium 4
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Chipset 3000
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Pentium 4
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.7+
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ Duo 1.83GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Chipset 3000
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS X Yosemite
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ Duo 1.83GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated GPU
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

  • Storage: 1 GB available space
